frontmatter.title: Museums Up - ReInherit’s Podcast fifteenth episode: "Sounding the Anthropocene. How to address climate change in museums."

node.excerpt: Dr. Soren Brothers, respected ecologist and Shiff Curator of Climate Change at the Royal Ontario Museum in Toronto talks about this emerging new position in museums. He will also explain the term Anthropocene and why museums should embrace it. Feel…
